summary.span: 一个描述概念模型中的基元类型的基类。

span.span: A base class that describes primitive types in a conceptual model.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关详细信息，请参阅[简单类型（EDM）](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1f387687-9372-49e9-8135-cc9650bfe539)和[简单类型（元数据）](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ddf09722-81b5-451b-a086-1dcf25a4f7d4)。For more information, see [Simple Types (EDM)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1f387687-9372-49e9-8135-cc9650bfe539) and [Simple Types (Metadata)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ddf09722-81b5-451b-a086-1dcf25a4f7d4).
